slider.experienceJoy: Experience the joy of Eid with our sustainably grown products.
slider.experienceTaste: Experience the taste of nature with organic farm products.
slider.ecoFriendlySustainable: We ensure eco-friendly and sustainable agriculture.
slider.cultivatingBest: Cultivating nature’s best with responsible farming.
slider.freshDirectFarm: Providing fresh and organic food directly from farms.

agriculture.description: We take part in many key international agricultural exhibitions, which gives us the opportunity to find new partners, learn new trends in the development of the agricultural sector, share experiences, present our products and the latest innovations.
agriculture.priorityDescription: When you work with us, you’ll see that absolute conditions is our priority.

service.priorityDescription: When you work with us, you will see that perfect terms are our priority.
service.nutrition_solutions_desc: We provide sustainable farming solutions tailored to your needs.
service.product_supplies_desc: High-quality supplies to boost your agricultural productivity.
service.fresh_vegetables_desc: Fresh, organic vegetables straight from the farm to your table.
service.organic_fruits_desc: Enjoy a variety of delicious organic fruits, grown naturally.
service.dairy_products_desc: Fresh and organic dairy products sourced directly from our farms.
service.poultry_products_desc: Premium quality poultry products raised in eco-friendly farms.
service.crop_protection_desc: Effective and sustainable crop protection services for higher yield.
service.soil_health_management_desc: Optimize your soil's fertility and productivity with our expert services.
service.water_management_desc: Sustainable and efficient water resource management for farming.
service.farm_mechanization_desc: Modernize your farm with our latest mechanization solutions.
service.weather_based_services_desc: Get farming advice and alerts based on real-time weather forecasts.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subTitle: Do You Have Any Questions?
faq.description: Explore the frequently asked questions below for quick solutions to common inquiries. We’ve got you covered with helpful insights and support.

faqs.question: What are the best crops to grow in this region?
faqs.answer: The best crops to grow depend on the climate and soil conditions. For this region, some suitable crops include wheat, corn, and soybeans.

faqs.question: How can we improve soil fertility?
faqs.answer: Soil fertility can be improved through crop rotation, the use of organic fertilizers, and adding compost or manure to enrich the soil.

faqs.question: What are the benefits of sustainable farming practices?
faqs.answer: Sustainable farming practices help preserve natural resources, reduce the carbon footprint, and ensure the long-term health of the ecosystem and the farm's productivity.

whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyChooseUs.subtitle: We Are Different From Other Farming
whyChooseUs.description: Our farming methods are sustainable, eco-friendly, and designed to deliver the highest quality produce. We prioritize nature and health in everything we do.
whyChooseUs.sustainablePracticesDesc: We use eco-friendly techniques to ensure the land remains fertile for future generations.
whyChooseUs.organicCertificationDesc: All our products are certified organic, free from harmful chemicals and pesticides.

testimonials.title: Our Testimonials
testimonials.subTitle: Hear What Our Global Clients Say About Us

testimonialsList.name: John Doe
testimonialsList.testimonial: The quality of the organic products from this farm is outstanding! It’s transformed my approach to sustainable farming.

testimonialsList.name: Jane Smith
testimonialsList.testimonial: I’ve been working with this team for years, and their commitment to quality and sustainability has never wavered. Truly impressive!

testimonialsList.name: Ali Rahman
testimonialsList.testimonial: I switched to their organic products, and I can see the difference in the taste and quality. Highly recommend!

aboutAgro.title: About Agro Mart
aboutAgro.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Sustainable Agriculture
aboutAgro.description: AgroMart is designed to connect farmers directly with consumers, businesses, and industrial buyers. The platform enables farmers to sell agricultural products, manage inventory, and process orders while providing consumers with fresh farm produce at fair prices. The goal of AgroMart is to bridge the gap between farmers and consumers, cut out middlemen, and offer an easy digital platform for buying and selling farm products. The platform aims to improve the agricultural economy by providing fair prices, efficient supply chains, and making products accessible to both rural and urban areas.
aboutAgro.agriculture_desc: We provide fresh, organic, and high-quality food products using modern farming techniques. Our goal is to deliver healthy and natural food to global markets
aboutAgro.vegetables_desc: We offer a wide range of fresh, organic food products, grown using modern and sustainable farming methods to ensure quality and health for all.
aboutAgro.mission: By transforming unused land into productive farms, AgroMart creates agricultural jobs, empowers youth, and promotes a greener future — all while strengthening the supply chain and boosting rural and urban access to fresh produce.

contactInfo.title: Contact Info
contactInfo.subtitle: Get in Touch
contactInfo.description: You can contact us through email, phone, or by filling out the form below. We aim to respond to all inquiries as quickly as possible and ensure your experience with us is seamless. Your communication is important to us, and we look forward to connecting with you!

weather-suggestion.title: Stay in Tune with the Weather for Farming and Product Selection!

notifications.title: 🌦️ Farming Alert
notifications.rain: It may rain today, please cover your crops. 🌧️
notifications.thunderstorm: A storm is likely! Stay cautious. ⛈️
notifications.extreme: Extreme weather conditions, take precautions for farming. 🔥

advice.rain: ☔ It may rain today, avoid water accumulation around plants.
advice.hot: 🔥 High temperature today, wheat may require extra irrigation.
advice.cold: ❄️ Cold weather today, use warm water for irrigating potatoes.
advice.normal: ✅ Today's weather is suitable for farming.

advice.hot: Today's temperature is very high (above 35°C). Provide extra irrigation for wheat. 🌾💧
advice.rain: It may rain today. Use a canopy to protect plants. 🌧️
advice.clear: The weather is clear, perfect time for farming. 🌞🌱
advice.thunderstorm: There is a risk of a storm. Cover crops and stay safe. ⛈️
advice.default: No special precautions based on the weather. Continue farming. 🌿
